headTitle: ICRAFT - Design, Websites, Branding - Located in Franklin, South Auckland.

items.name: intro
items.title: LOOKING TO UPGRADE YOUR DIGITAL PRESENCE?
items.text: Here at ICRAFT we provide a range of solutions to help you get online and get noticed.

items.name: websites
items.title: STUNNING, FAST AND SECURE WEBSITES
items.text: ICRAFTS Top Quality websties are hand crafted to support your brand. They use the latest tech and design trends to keep your visitors engaged.

items.name: branding
items.title: PERSONALISED BRANDED CONTENT
items.text: From Logo's to Flyer's to Business Cards and everything in between. We create unique and impacting content that helps your business stand out for the right reasons.

items.name: it solutions
items.title: IMPROVE YOUR WORKFLOW TOOLS
items.text: This modern age is full of helpful tools to help you focus on what you do best. ICRAFT can help find the right tools for you.

testimonials.author: John Marshall
testimonials.title: President, Springfield Country Club
testimonials.quote: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.

testimonials.author: Joe Malonagi
testimonials.title: General Manager, Springfield Tower
testimonials.quote: The complexities and challenges AlphaConstruction successfully overcame on our behalf includes substantial permit obstacles, coordination and selection support of all design and finish materials, and the diffculty of integrating existing and new structures.
